Help.Title: How to Use
Help.Step1: Click "Height Edit Mode" to activate editing
Help.Step2: Select a brush height from the toolbar
Help.Step3: Click on grid squares to set their height
Help.Step4: Tokens will automatically update their elevation
Help.Step5: Add flying units to the exception list to prevent auto-updates
